title: Easy Run – 3.0 Mile Progression Toward 4 (Block 3, Week 3, Monday)
notes: Rebuild toward 4 mi target after reduced volume + foot rest. Ran 1 mi pain-free earlier today. Keep RPE 5–6. Break into controlled segments; stop if lateral foot pain >2/10 or alters gait. Aim to reach 3.0 total; optional last 0.25 if fully symptom-free.
